modName: Althirs Camping Tools - Portable Fire and Tent
summary: This Mod adds some portable camping tools to the Game. On jour journey throughout Skyrim you can now carry and use a small and a big tent, a campfire, a bedroll, a bench, a cooking pot, a scanning reg, a target, a chopping block and a Alchemy and Armor Workbanch.
descriptionHtml:
[size=+2][b] Althirs Camping Tools - Portable Fire and Tent[/b][/size]

[size=+1][b]This Mod adds some portable and useable camping tools to the Game. [/b][/size]

At the blacksmith Alvor in Riverwood you can buy a small and a big tent, a campfire, a bedroll, a bench, a cooking pot, a scanning reg, a target, a chopping block and a Alchemy and Armor Workbanch. And you can turn every normal Firewood into a nice campfire with working light and sound. To use the items just put them on the ground and activate them while you are sneaking. To deactivate the appeared objects activate them while you are sneaking, too. Then you can collect the portable items by activate them without sneaking.

To install just copy the esm and the bsa file into your Data folder and activate the esm. Run the game and travel to Anvor in Riverwood where you can buy the camping tools.

If you installed a previous version it might be possible that you have to save the game without this mod first, then enabeling the mod and save again.

If Alvor died you can get the items via the console: type \"help portable\" [\"help tragbar\" for the german version] and you get a list of all items with a number. Then type \"player.additem [Number] 1\".

[size=+1][b]Have fun with your new camping equipment :-) [/b][/size]

Thanks goes to ANB (Fire and Tents in Oblivion) and Elec0 (Skyrimnexus) for their scripts.
And now to Mcxar too, because I now used one of his/her scripts and the mesh for the tree stump. The other scripts are mostly inspired by Elec0. And to Bethesda Softworks of course, because they made such wonderful role playing games and give us the possibility to create our own contest (I played their games since Daggerfall andI I\'ve fallen in love with each game of the TES Series :-)

source directory
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9889
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9935&navtag=file/images.php?id=9935&tab=3

[size=+1][b]Update 30.03.2012:Uploaded a new version with a tree stump to sit and with very small changes on the scripts. Now the items get back into your inventory automatically if you placed the static object.[/b][/size]

[size=+1][b]Update 09.09.2012:Added a anvil, a enchanting workbench and a sharpening wheel.[/b][/size]

[size=+1][b]Update 19.11.2012: Now compatible with the	
Frostfall - Hypothermia Camping Survival mod (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11163/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D11163) But you have to load this mod AFTER the Hypothermia mod to get it to work.
[/b][/size]
author: Althir
